item.title: Sperax
item.description: Sperax: An Approach to Defeat Long Range Attacks in Blockchains [Abstract] Since Bitcoin’s seminal work of achieving consensus under the assumption that more than 51% computational power is honest, many researchers have proposed various kinds of consensus protocol.s In recent years, there has been a trend in designing proof of stake (PoS) based consensus protocols. Unfortunately, PoS based consensus protocols are inherently not secure and are vulnerable to “long range attacks”.
